comment: Alternate definition of a group as semigroup (with at least one element) which is also a quasigroup, i.e. a magma in which solutions ` x ` and ` y ` of the equations ` ( a .+ x ) = b ` and ` ( x .+ a ) = b ` exist. Theorem 3.2 of [Bruck] p. 28. (Contributed by AV, 28-Aug-2021.)
